name: Stephanie and the Rainbow Gems
description:
SHE'S BACK!!!!

Stephanie has returned in this all new adventure entitled
Stephanie and the Rainbow Gems. In this brand new adventure
Stephanie has to defeat the evil wizard Gazar and save her
homeland. While she is at it she must find the seven hidden
rainbow gems and something happens to her when she obtains
all seven of the Rainbow Gems.
Features:
21 new challenging levels
2 ways to complete a stage. Either reach the end or find a
rainbow icon and play through the bonus levels.
7 Hard intense bosses for Stephanie to defeat.
New Soundtrack that is absolutely amazing.
Controls:
Arrow keys = Move Stephanie left or right
Z Key = Run
X Key = Jump
Enter = Start Game
Escape = Quit Game
Spacebar = Reset the Game
